lines.text: ...You know what I think?
What?
I think apple empanadas are delicious. I could really go for an apple empanada.
Huh? I mean- yeah, sure, but we’re workin’ here.
What if I told you I knew exactly why that wizard started the fire?
Well, that’d be-
Would you treat me to breakfast at the food trucks after we finished here? Buy me an apple empanada or two?
What, if you tell me you know why the wizard started the fire?
Exactamundo, boss!
I think if you do that... I’ll not add any more time to your parole, kid. You don’t get a prize for doin’ what you’re told.
...Empanadas do sound good, though…
...Is that a-
Sure, what the heck. We’ll get a bite after the job. Hit me.
Well...
You know that little hole we found in Emmup’s body?
Yeah? What about it?
I think… <c=#FF00FF>that’s</c> the actual cause of death.
The actual cause of death? You mean-
It wasn’t the fire. Why kill someone with a fire that burns down half your apartment? There’s loads of better ways.
But whatever killed him… they didn’t want us to know what it was.
They needed a fake cause of death- something that’d burn away any spilled blood, cauterize the wound, and distract us so we wouldn’t notice.
I bet Opal noticed when she checked out the body- and made sure his coat was hiding it from us.
Couldn’t have us noticing something like that, right?
I- I- that’s- that’s- you’re making…!
These are baseless accusations! Y-you can’t prove- I mean, I didn’t! I didn’t touch the body!
...sigh.
Well, that’s… compelling, but-
I’m not done! The fire pulled double duty, right? It hid the real cause of death pretty well- but it also played into their other trick!
I bet the wizard used it to char his own robes, just so we’d think he could cast <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit.</c>
That thing where they wanted us to think they were level 2, remember?
...Hm. It’s all starting to add up.
Maybe not, but… it’s all starting to add up.
I’ve got some more questions about that ‘’real’’ cause of death, but I’m gonna put a pin in ‘em for now.
You’ll have your empanadas, kid.
(yesssssssss)
